workshops.title: Intro to Machine Learning
workshops.description: In this workshop, you will learn the basics of machine learning and how to implement simple algorithms in Python. Topics covered include linear regression, logistic regression, and decision trees.

workshops.title: Advanced Machine Learning
workshops.description: Take your machine learning skills to the next level with this advanced workshop. Topics covered include neural networks, deep learning, and natural language processing. Prerequisite: Intro to Machine Learning workshop or equivalent experience.

workshops.title: Introduction to Blockchain
workshops.description: Learn about the basics of blockchain technology and how to build simple decentralized applications (DApps) on the Ethereum platform. No prior knowledge of blockchain required.

workshops.title: Data Visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn
workshops.description: Learn how to create beautiful and informative data visualizations using the Matplotlib and Seaborn libraries in Python. This workshop is suitable for beginners.

workshops.title: Intro to Cybersecurity
workshops.description: Learn about the fundamentals of cybersecurity and how to protect your systems and data from threats. Topics covered include network security, password management, and threat intelligence.

workshops.title: Intro to Data Science
workshops.description: Learn about the basics of data science and how to use Python to perform data analysis. Topics covered include data manipulation, visualization, and basic machine learning techniques.

workshops.title: Intro to Cloud Computing
workshops.description: Learn about the basics of cloud computing and how to use cloud services to build and deploy applications. Topics covered include cloud architecture, security, and cost optimization.

workshops.title: Intro to DevOps
workshops.description: Learn about the principles of DevOps and how to implement continuous delivery and deployment pipelines. Topics covered include version control, testing, and infrastructure as code.

workshops.title: Intro to Mobile App Development
workshops.description: Learn how to build native mobile apps for Android and iOS using Java and Swift. Topics covered include design patterns, testing, and publishing to the app store.
